alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa Coastal; Okaloosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 1:56PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Okaloosa County through 145 PM CDT... At 1255 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Wright, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Niceville and Valparaiso. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
